languages.text: "Конечно же нет, шерин". {n}Голос Джай полон веселого энтузиазма ровно настолько же, что и мгновение назад.{/n} "Это будет слишком быстро. В предвкушении и игре таится одна из главных сладостей страсти. Это тонкое искусство — взогнать ее, словно кипящий прометий, но освободить прежде, чем грянет взрыв. Но и награда за это восхитительна. Я слишком ценю ваше общество, шерин, чтобы оставить это блюдо неиспробованным и жадно наброситься сразу на десерт. А вы — достаточно цените меня?"

"Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"
languages.original_text: "Конечно же нет, шерин". {n}Голос Джай полон веселого энтузиазма ровно настолько же, что и мгновение назад.{/n} "Это будет слишком быстро. В предвкушении и игре таится одна из главных сладостей страсти. Это тонкое искусство — взогнать ее, словно кипящий прометий, но освободить прежде, чем грянет взрыв. Но и награда за это восхитительна. Я слишком ценю ваше общество, шерин, чтобы оставить это блюдо неиспробованным и жадно наброситься сразу на десерт. А вы — достаточно цените меня?"

I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «En absoluto, shereen». {n}La voz de Jae no pierde ni un ápice de su alegre entusiasmo.{/n} «Eso sería correr demasiado. La anticipación y los juegos son una de las mayores delicias de la pasión. Hay un arte en agitarlas como el prometio hirviente y liberarla antes de que estalle. Pero la recompensa es algo sublime. Valoro demasiado su compañía como para dejar sin degustar este plato solo para lanzarme al postre. Pero ¿me valora usted lo suficiente como para esperar?».
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto, shereen». {n}La voz de Jae no pierde ni un ápice de su alegre entusiasmo.{/n} «Eso sería correr demasiado. La anticipación y los juegos son una de las mayores delicias de la pasión. Hay un arte en agitarlas como el prometio hirviente y liberarla antes de que estalle. Pero la recompensa es algo sublime. Valoro demasiado su compañía como para dejar sin degustar este plato solo para lanzarme al postre. Pero ¿me valora usted lo suficiente como para esperar?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “那可不行，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的声音和刚刚一样，充满了欢快的热情。{/n}“那样恐怕就太快了，只有在期待与游戏之中，这一切才会充满激情与乐趣。如何让激情像沸腾的钷素一样沸腾，并在爆炸之前释放出来，是门高超的艺术。当然，回报也极为甜蜜。我实在是太珍惜你的陪伴了，亲爱的。我不能为了贪婪地享用甜点，而舍弃品尝主菜的机会。不过，你是否会愿意重视我，愿意等待呢？”
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: “那可不行，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的声音和刚刚一样，充满了欢快的热情。{/n}“那样恐怕就太快了，只有在期待与游戏之中，这一切才会充满激情与乐趣。如何让激情像沸腾的钷素一样沸腾，并在爆炸之前释放出来，是门高超的艺术。当然，回报也极为甜蜜。我实在是太珍惜你的陪伴了，亲爱的。我不能为了贪婪地享用甜点，而舍弃品尝主菜的机会。不过，你是否会愿意重视我，愿意等待呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それはダメだよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの声は先ほどと同じように明るい熱意に満ちている。{/n}「ちょっと早すぎる。期待と駆け引きの中に、情熱の大きな喜びが隠されているんだ。プロメチウムを沸騰させるようにかき混ぜて、爆発する前に放出するのには優れた技術が必要よ。だけどその報酬は崇高なもの。あんたとの付き合いはあたしにとってすごく大切なんだ、シャリーン。デザートをたっぷり楽しむには、料理を試さないわけにはいかないだろう。だけどあんたはあたしのために待つことができるかい？」
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: 「それはダメだよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの声は先ほどと同じように明るい熱意に満ちている。{/n}「ちょっと早すぎる。期待と駆け引きの中に、情熱の大きな喜びが隠されているんだ。プロメチウムを沸騰させるようにかき混ぜて、爆発する前に放出するのには優れた技術が必要よ。だけどその報酬は崇高なもの。あんたとの付き合いはあたしにとってすごく大切なんだ、シャリーン。デザートをたっぷり楽しむには、料理を試さないわけにはいかないだろう。だけどあんたはあたしのために待つことができるかい？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'y pensez pas, shereen. {n}La voix de Jae reste aussi enthousiaste qu'un instant plus tôt.{/n} Ce serait trop rapide. C'est dans l'anticipation et le jeu de séduction que l'on goûte aux délices suprêmes de la passion. C'est un art délicat que de faire monter la température jusqu'au point d'ébullition pour mieux ouvrir les vannes juste avant l'explosion finale, mais la récompense à la clé est absolument fabuleuse. J'apprécie trop votre compagnie pour renoncer à ce mets de choix afin de passer immédiatement au dessert. Et vous, m'êtes-vous suffisamment {mf|attaché|attachée} pour prendre votre mal en patience ? »
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'y pensez pas, shereen. {n}La voix de Jae reste aussi enthousiaste qu'un instant plus tôt.{/n} Ce serait trop rapide. C'est dans l'anticipation et le jeu de séduction que l'on goûte aux délices suprêmes de la passion. C'est un art délicat que de faire monter la température jusqu'au point d'ébullition pour mieux ouvrir les vannes juste avant l'explosion finale, mais la récompense à la clé est absolument fabuleuse. J'apprécie trop votre compagnie pour renoncer à ce mets de choix afin de passer immédiatement au dessert. Et vous, m'êtes-vous suffisamment {mf|attaché|attachée} pour prendre votre mal en patience ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Gewiss nicht, Shereen." {n}Jaes Stimme ist noch immer so voll freudiger Begeisterung wie einen Augenblick zuvor.{/n} "Das wäre zu schnell. Eine der größten Vergnügungen der Leidenschaft liegt doch in der Vorfreude und im Spiel. Es ist eine diffizile Kunst, sie wie kochendes Promethium aufzuheizen und dann kurz vor der Explosion freizusetzen. Doch die Belohnung ist himmlisch. Mir ist Eure Gesellschaft zu viel wert, Shereen, um dieses Gericht einfach ungekostet zu lassen, nur um mich gierig auf das Dessert zu stürzen. Doch bin ich Euch auch genug wert, um auf mich zu warten?"
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: "Gewiss nicht, Shereen." {n}Jaes Stimme ist noch immer so voll freudiger Begeisterung wie einen Augenblick zuvor.{/n} "Das wäre zu schnell. Eine der größten Vergnügungen der Leidenschaft liegt doch in der Vorfreude und im Spiel. Es ist eine diffizile Kunst, sie wie kochendes Promethium aufzuheizen und dann kurz vor der Explosion freizusetzen. Doch die Belohnung ist himmlisch. Mir ist Eure Gesellschaft zu viel wert, Shereen, um dieses Gericht einfach ungekostet zu lassen, nur um mich gierig auf das Dessert zu stürzen. Doch bin ich Euch auch genug wert, um auf mich zu warten?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

languages.text: "Olmaz şirinim." {n}Jae'ın sesi hâlâ az önceki gibi neşeli ve coşkulu.{/n} "Fazla hızlı ilerlemiş oluruz. Tutkunun zevki, işin içinde beklenti ve oyunlar olduğunda çıkar. Onu prometyum gibi karıştırıp karıştırıp tam patlamadan önce salıvermek lazım gelir. Ödülü de olağanüstüdür ya. Seninle bir arada olmak, benim için fazlasıyla değerli şirinim. Yemeğin tadını çıkarmadan açgözlülükle tatlıya yumulmak istemiyorum. Sen peki bana beni bekleyecek kadar değer veriyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Certainly not, shereen." {n}Jae's voice is as full of cheerful enthusiasm as it was a moment ago.{/n} "That would be too fast. In the anticipation and the game lies one of passion's great delights. There is a fine art to stirring it up like boiling promethium and releasing it before it explodes. But the reward is sublime. I value your company too much, shereen, to leave this dish untasted just so I can greedily delve into dessert. But do you value me enough to wait?"

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle olmaz şirinim." {n}Jae'ın sesi hâlâ az önce olduğu kadar neşeli ve coşkulu.{/n} "Bu fazla hızlı ilerlemek olur. Tutkunun zevki en güzel, işin içinde beklenti ve oyunlar olduğunda çıkar. Onu prometyum gibi karıştırıp, karıştırıp, tam patlamadan önce salıvermek bir sanattır. Ödülü de olağanüstüdür ama. Seninle bir arada olmak benim için fazlasıyla değerli şirinim, bu yemeğin tadını çıkarmadan açgözlülükle tatlıya yumulmak istemiyorum. Sen peki bana beni bekleyecek kadar değer veriyor musun?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
